title: Experiencing a flight delay or cancellation and waiting for updates or alternative options from the airline staff.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Excuse me, sir. We regret to inform you that your flight has been cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances. However, we are working on arranging alternative options for you. Please bear with us as we find the best solution for your travel needs.
turns.user_response_option_en: Can I have a meal voucher, please?
